name: FLYING HEADROID, THEOPOLIS - Dr Abstract 2021
description:
If you are a flying bot shaped like the head of a human, then chances are, you are a member of the noble Flying Headroids! The first is Headroid Theopolis named after the great Doctor. 
 
Poke the Headroid all over including its extremities. Make the Headroid say anything you want! Amuse guests, take over the world - collect this Headroid and it is yours to command!

Note the gravity rings made by the ZIM Emitter. The sounds are made with ZIM Synth and animated with ZIM Soundwave. Clouds pass by with the aid of ZIM Scroller. Words are ZIM LabelLetters animated with ZIM animate. The text field is a ZIM TextInput right on the canvas. 

Collect this first of a fleet of Headroids designed by ZIM Founder and inaugural member of the Gadget Minters, Dr Abstract! Find out more about making ZIM NFTs at https://zimjs.com/nft. Find out more about the Gadget Minters at https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters.

Code Creativity!
